llm_res.rule: allowance function should return the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
symbol - Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
transferFrom function should return a boolean value indicating success or failure.
